name: Football Sprites 2D
description:
2 Background Football Field sprites.
(1) with SpawnCampGames Logo and (1) without,

Allowing for customization with your own logo or Banner.
2D Sprite sheet with :

  • Football with sprites for a kick and a throw animation..
  • Power Meter and Aiming Arrow
  • Yellow touchdown markers
  • Referee with Penalty flags..
  • 2 Teams w/ Benched Players
